name: BCard
desc: It provides alignment for own children like grid, based on rows and columns.

infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: Can be used to render elements inside the Card.

infoArray.name: containerStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the container element.

infoArray.name: expandable
infoArray.desc: If true, this card component is expandable. Can be set on any child of the `Card` component.

infoArray.name: expanded
infoArray.desc: Whether this card is expanded. If `true` or `false` the component is controlled. if `null` the component is uncontrolled.

infoArray.name: initiallyExpanded
infoArray.desc: Whether this card is initially expanded.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: disableGridBehaviour
infoArray.desc: Default behaviour on card, children are align in grid layout. This prop provides prevent it. Default False.

infoArray.name: contentAlignMode
infoArray.desc: Alignment mode of cards; it provides multi-column, single-column and mobile modes for cards. Default ContentAlignMode.MULTI.

infoArray.name: hasMedia
infoArray.desc: Whether this card has media or not

infoArray.name: mediaImage
infoArray.desc: Image path of card media image

infoArray.name: onExpandChange
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the `expandable` state of the card has changed. @param {boolean} newExpandedState Represents the new `expanded` state of the card.
